channel.title: Need a good source and client to start off :/
channel.description:
.-. um... if its a blank source, how can i update it to make it look better?
How do i add more spells like (storm of armadyl in modern spells)... How can i like change the graphics?? Add working full screen??
How can i make it load a higher cache? Like a 317 loading 634 gfx animations, items graphics (no customs involve) or 317 loading 667?
Soz but im kinda like a beginner for this :/

You can’t find a clean hyperion or rune-source base? Really?

I’m pretty sure if you want the “cleanest” try the original bases.

item.title: Need a good source and client to start off :/
item.dc:creator: @Ole_Kristian Ole Kristian
item.description:
@Ole_Kristian wrote:

Hello!

I am working on a 317 winterLove project myself!
Others have recommended me to use a different base, like RuneSource.
Why? To get used to better programming habits and a more decent source.

If you are only going to change the low hanging fruit of a server, you’d be easily enslaved to follow other people’s naming conventions and programming habits etc…
I do not know how skilled you are to Java-programming itself, but once you got you’r hands on a server and a client, my advice would be to try learning and modifying
from the server’s main-method and follow the flow of code. Try to add comments that you understand.

Besides it all, good luck my friend!

Read full topic
item.source: Need a good source and client to start off :/
